articles.title: Arsenal, Tottenham and Chelsea financial punishment over European Super League fiasco revealed - Football.London
articles.description: The six English clubs agreed to play in the much-maligned, breakaway European Super League and will now have pay a combined £20m to draw a line under the issue
articles.content: Arsenal, Tottenham and Chelsea were all involved in failed plans to form a European Super League, but after pressure from fans all over Europe, the London clubs pulled out of the impending competitio… [+2696 chars]

articles.title: 'No longer illegal to holiday': Vaccine passports passed by European Parliament - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The cert, due to be introduced in Ireland on July 19th, will show if a passenger has been vaccinated, tested negative for Covid, or has recovered from the virus
articles.content:
The European Parliament has passed the EUs proposal for vaccine passports, which aim to facilitate the resumption of travel across the bloc.
